claims.claim: Improved time-to-market by automatically categorizing products across 30 million product portfolio
claims.quote: Gemini on Google Cloud improved Wayfair's time-to-market by automatically categorizing products across its 30 million product portfolio

claims.claim: Delivered cost savings by eliminating manual tagging of product attributes
claims.quote: delivered cost savings by eliminating the need to manually tag attributes like color and style

claims.claim: Improved conversion rates through increased accuracy and coverage of product attributes
claims.quote: improved conversion rates by increasing the accuracy of product attributes and improving the coverage of attribute tags in the retailer's catalog

claims.claim: Reduced hyperparameter tuning time from two weeks to under one hour
claims.quote: Reducing hyperparameter tuning from two weeks to under one hour

claims.claim: Reduced new real-time model deployment time from one month to one hour
claims.quote: In the past, getting a new real-time model up and running took around a month of work. Now, thanks to automating our processes with Vertex AI and a streamlined deployment architecture, we have cut that down to just one hour.

claims.claim: Enabled data scientists to productionize models without depending on engineers
claims.quote: Our aim with Vertex AI is to empower data scientists to productionize models and easily monitor and evolve them without depending on engineers.

claims.claim: Supports 30 million active customers through ML-powered experiences
claims.quote: Machine Learning (ML) is part of everything we do at Wayfair to support each of the 30 million active customers on our website.
